title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the key blank, but assign a valid value to it.
3. Load the chart and observe that the externalized text is not displayed.
